./configure --prefix=/home/wmt/dfb --disable-x11 --with-inputdrivers=keyboard,ps2mouse --enable-static --disable-shared


gcc 
-I/usr/include/freetype2
-O3
-ffast-math
-pipe-W
-D
-W
-o

../src/.libs/libdirectfb.a
...libfusion.a
libfusion.a
libdirect.a
libdirect.a
-lz
-lpthread

directfb-1.1-0/systems/libdirectfb_fbdev.a
directfb_fbdev()

directfb-1.1-0/wm/libdirectfbwm_default.a
directfbwm_default()

directfb-1.1-0/interfaces/IDirectFBFont/libidirectfbfont_ft2.a
IDirectFBFont_FT2();
